title: UE Boom 2 gets Block Party mode so you can blast friends’ tunes
text:
UE Boom 2 gets Block Party mode so you can blast friends’ tunes 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
SAN FRANCISCO — A slick new feature coming to Ultimate Ears’ Bluetooth speakers will let you stream your friends’ music from the palm ...
